english.segment1: When I waited so long, when my tears were my song. With my hope nearly gone You held me God. To believe in the face of the dry, weary place. When You felt far away You held me God
english.segment2: Oh, there is freedom in surrender, oh I know it
english.segment3: Your songs have never stopped. You've been singing, always singing over me. Your words are still enough. And You're singing, always singing over me
english.segment4: The chaos in the cause teaching me to see Lord. The beauty in the storm so I believe. When I see through Your eyes through the testing of time. Every cloud silver lined 'cause You're with me
english.segment5: Oh, there is freedom in surrender, oh I know it
english.segment6: Your songs have never stopped. You've been singing, always singing over me. Your words are still enough. And You're singing
english.segment7: Give me faith. Give me strength enough to wait. To stand in faith. And listen for, listen for Your melody
english.segment8: Your songs have never stopped. Your songs have never stopped
english.segment9: Your songs have never stopped. You've been singing, always singing over me. Your words are still enough. And You're singing, always singing over me
english.segment10: Your songs have never stopped. You've been singing, always singing over me. Your words are still enough. And You're singing, always singing over me. Always singing over me, always singing over me. Always singing over me
